workStyles.name: Attention to Detail
workStyles.description: A tendency to be detail-oriented, organized, and thorough in completing work.

workStyles.name: Cautiousness
workStyles.description: A tendency to be careful, deliberate, and risk-avoidant when making work-related decisions or doing work.

workStyles.name: Dependability
workStyles.description: A tendency to be reliable, responsible, and consistent in meeting work-related obligations.

workStyles.name: Integrity
workStyles.description: A tendency to be honest and ethical at work.

workStyles.name: Self-Control
workStyles.description: A tendency to remain calm and composed and to manage emotions effectively in response to criticism or difficult situations at work.

workStyles.name: Stress Tolerance
workStyles.description: A tendency to cope and function effectively in stressful situations at work.

workStyles.name: Cooperation
workStyles.description: A tendency to be pleasant, helpful, and willing to assist others at work.

workStyles.name: Empathy
workStyles.description: A tendency to show concern for others and be sensitive to others' needs and feelings at work.

workStyles.name: Humility
workStyles.description: A tendency to be modest and humble when interacting with others at work.

workStyles.name: Optimism
workStyles.description: A tendency to exhibit a positive attitude and positive emotions at work, even under difficult circumstances.

workStyles.name: Sincerity
workStyles.description: A tendency to be genuine and sincere in interactions with others at work, without concern for personal gain or self-interest.

workStyles.name: Social Orientation
workStyles.description: A tendency to seek out, enjoy, and be energized by social interaction at work.

workStyles.name: Achievement Orientation
workStyles.description: A tendency to establish and maintain personally challenging work-related goals, set high work-related standards, and exert high effort toward meeting those goals and standards.

workStyles.name: Adaptability
workStyles.description: A tendency to be open to and comfortable with change, new experiences, or ideas at work.

workStyles.name: Initiative
workStyles.description: A tendency to be proactive and take on extra responsibilities and tasks that may fall outside of one's required work role.

workStyles.name: Innovation
workStyles.description: A tendency to be inventive, to be imaginative, and to adopt new perspectives on ways to accomplish work.

workStyles.name: Intellectual Curiosity
workStyles.description: A tendency to seek out and acquire new work-related knowledge and obtain a deep understanding of work-related subjects.

workStyles.name: Leadership Orientation
workStyles.description: A tendency to lead, take charge, offer opinions, and provide direction at work.

workStyles.name: Perseverance
workStyles.description: A tendency to exhibit determination and resolve to perform or complete tasks in the face of difficult circumstances or obstacles at work.

workStyles.name: Self-Confidence
workStyles.description: A tendency to believe in one's work-related capabilities and ability to control one's work-related outcomes.

workStyles.name: Tolerance for Ambiguity
workStyles.description: A tendency to be comfortable with ambiguity and uncertainty at work.
